vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ
dadānīty eva taṃ dāśo dharmātmā pratyabhāṣata
tato 'ntarikṣe 'psaraso devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tathā
taṃ dṛṣṭvā duṣkaraṃ karma praśaśaṃsuś ca pārthivāḥ
abhyavarṣanta kusumair bhīṣmo 'yam iti cābruvan
tataḥ sa pitur arthāya tām uvāca yaśasvinīm
adhiroha rathaṃ mātar gacchāvaḥ svagṛhān iti
evam uktvā tu bhīṣmas tāṃ ratham āropya bhāminīm
āgamya hāstinapuraṃ śaṃtanoḥ saṃnyavedayat
tasya tad duṣkaraṃ karma praśaśaṃsur narādhipāḥ
sametāś ca pṛthak caiva bhīṣmo 'yam iti cābruvan
tad dṛṣṭvā duṣkaraṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhīṣmeṇa śaṃtanuḥ
babhūva duḥkhito rājā cirarātrāya bhārata
sa tena karmaṇā sūnoḥ prītas tasmai varaṃ dadau
svacchandamaraṇaṃ tasmai dadau tuṣṭaḥ pitā svayam
na te prabhavitā mṛtyur yāvad icchasi jīvitum
tvatto hy anujñāṃ saṃprāpya mṛtyuḥ prabhavitānagha
svena kāmena kartāsi nākāmas tvaṃ kathaṃ cana
vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
cedirājasutāṃ jñātvā dāśarājena poṣitām
vivāhaṃ kārayām āsa śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā
tato vivāhe nirvṛtte sa rājā śaṃtanur nṛpaḥ
tāṃ kanyāṃ rūpasaṃpannāṃ svagṛhe saṃnyaveśayat
tataḥ śāṃtanavo dhīmān satyavatyām ajāyata
vīraś citrāṅgado nāma vīryeṇa manujān ati
athāparaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ satyavatyāṃ punaḥ prabhuḥ
vicitravīryaṃ rājānaṃ janayām āsa vīryavān
aprāptavati tasmiṃś ca yauvanaṃ bharatarṣabha
sa rājā śaṃtanur dhīmān kāladharmam upeyivān
svargate śaṃtanau bhīṣmaś citrāṅgadam ariṃdamam
sthāpayām āsa vai rājye satyavatyā mate sthitaḥ
sa tu citrāṅgadaḥ śauryāt sarvāṃś cikṣepa pārthivān
manuṣyaṃ na hi mene sa kaṃ cit sadṛśam ātmanaḥ
taṃ kṣipantaṃ surāṃś caiva manuṣyān asurāṃs tathā
gandharvarājo balavāṃs tulyanāmābhyayāt tadā
tvaṃ vai sadṛśanāmāsi yuddhaṃ dehi nṛpātmaja
nāma vānyat pragṛhṇīṣva yadi yuddhaṃ na dāsyasi
tvayāhaṃ yuddham icchāmi tvatsakāśāt tu nāmataḥ
āgato 'smi vṛthābhāṣyo na gacchen nāmato mayā
ity uktvā garjamānau tau hiraṇyātīram āśritau
tenāsya sumahad yuddhaṃ kurukṣetre babhūva ha
tayor balavatos tatra gandharvakurumukhyayoḥ
nadyās tīre hiraṇvatyāḥ samās tisro 'bhavad raṇaḥ
tasmin vimarde tumule śastravṛṣṭisamākule
māyādhiko 'vadhīd vīraṃ gandharvaḥ kurusattamam
citrāṅgadaṃ kuruśreṣṭhaṃ vicitraśarakārmukam
antāya kṛtvā gandharvo divam ācakrame tataḥ
tasmin nṛpatiśārdūle nihate bhūrivarcasi
bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo rājan pretakāryāṇy akārayat
vicitravīryaṃ ca tadā bālam aprāptayauvanam
kururājye mahābāhur abhyaṣiñcad anantaram
vicitravīryas tu tadā bhīṣmasya vacane sthitaḥ
anvaśāsan mahārāja pitṛpaitāmahaṃ padam
sa dharmaśāstrakuśalo bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ nṛpaḥ
pūjayām āsa dharmeṇa sa cainaṃ pratyapālayat
vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
hate citrāṅgade bhīṣmo bāle bhrātari cānagha
pālayām āsa tad rājyaṃ satyavatyā mate sthitaḥ
tathā vicitravīryaṃ tu vartamānaṃ sukhe 'tule
saṃprāptayauvanaṃ paśyan bhrātaraṃ dhīmatāṃ varam
bhīṣmo vicitravīryasya vivāhāyākaron matim
atha kāśipater bhīṣmaḥ kanyās tisro 'psaraḥsamāḥ
śuśrāva sahitā rājan vṛṇvatīr vai svayaṃ varam
tataḥ sa rathināṃ śreṣṭho rathenaikena varmabhṛt
jagāmānumate mātuḥ purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ prati
tatra rājñaḥ samuditān sarvataḥ samupāgatān
dadarśa kanyās tāś caiva bhīṣmaḥ śaṃtanunandanaḥ
tāsāṃ kāmena saṃmattāḥ sahitāḥ kāśikosalāḥ
vaṅgāḥ puṇḍrāḥ kaliṅgāś ca te jagmus tāṃ purīṃ prati
kīrtyamāneṣu rājñāṃ tu nāmasv atha sahasraśaḥ
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
ekākinaṃ tadā bhīṣmaṃ vṛddhaṃ śāṃtanunandanam
sodvegā iva taṃ dṛṣṭvā kanyāḥ paramaśobhanāḥ
apākrāmanta tāḥ sarvā vṛddha ity eva cintayā
vṛddhaḥ paramadharmātmā valīpalitadhāraṇaḥ
kiṃkāraṇam ihāyāto nirlajjo bharatarṣabhaḥ
mithyāpratijño lokeṣu kiṃ vadiṣyati bhārata
brahmacārīti bhīṣmo hi vṛthaiva prathito bhuvi
ity evaṃ prabruvantas te hasanti sma nṛpādhamāḥ
kṣatriyāṇāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā bhīṣmaś cukrodha bhārata
bhīṣmaḥ svayaṃ tadā rājan varayām āsa tāḥ prabhuḥ
uvāca ca mahīpālān rājañ jaladaniḥsvanaḥ
ratham āropya tāḥ kanyā bhīṣmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
āhūya dānaṃ kanyānāṃ guṇavadbhyaḥ smṛtaṃ budhaiḥ
alaṃkṛtya yathāśakti pradāya ca dhanāny api
prayacchanty apare kanyāṃ mithunena gavām api
vittena kathitenānye balenānye 'numānya ca
pramattām upayānty anye svayam anye ca vindate
ārṣaṃ vidhiṃ puraskṛtya dārān vindanti cāpare
aṣṭamaṃ tam atho vitta vivāhaṃ kavibhiḥ smṛtam
svayaṃvaraṃ tu rājanyāḥ praśaṃsanty upayānti ca
pramathya tu hṛtām āhur jyāyasīṃ dharmavādinaḥ
tā imāḥ pṛthivīpālā jihīrṣāmi balād itaḥ
te yatadhvaṃ paraṃ śaktyā vijayāyetarāya vā
sthito 'haṃ pṛthivīpālā yuddhāya kṛtaniścayaḥ
evam uktvā mahīpālān kāśirājaṃ ca vīryavān
sarvāḥ kanyāḥ sa kauravyo ratham āropayat svakam
āmantrya ca sa tān prāyāc chīghraṃ kanyāḥ pragṛhya tāḥ
tatas te pārthivāḥ sarve samutpetur amarṣitāḥ
saṃspṛśantaḥ svakān bāhūn daśanto daśanacchadān
teṣām ābharaṇāny āśu tvaritānāṃ vimuñcatām
āmuñcatāṃ ca varmāṇi saṃbhramaḥ sumahān abhūt
tārāṇām iva saṃpāto babhūva janamejaya
bhūṣaṇānāṃ ca śubhrāṇāṃ kavacānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
savarmabhir bhūṣaṇais te drāg bhrājadbhir itas tataḥ
sakrodhāmarṣajihmabhrūsakaṣāyadṛśas tathā
sūtopakḷptān rucirān sadaśvodyatadhūrgatān
rathān āsthāya te vīrāḥ sarvapraharaṇānvitāḥ
prayāntam ekaṃ kauravyam anusasrur udāyudhāḥ
tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ teṣāṃ tasya ca bhārata
ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
te tv iṣūn daśasāhasrāṃs tasmai yugapad ākṣipan
aprāptāṃś caiva tān āśu bhīṣmaḥ sarvāṃs tadācchinat
ācchinac charavarṣeṇa mahatā lomavāhinā
tatas te pārthivāḥ sarve sarvataḥ parivārayan
vavarṣuḥ śaravarṣeṇa varṣeṇevādrim ambudāḥ
sa tad bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ śarair āvārya sarvataḥ
tataḥ sarvān mahīpālān pratyavidhyat tribhis tribhiḥ
ekaikas tu tato bhīṣmaṃ rājan vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
sa ca tān prativivyādha dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ parākramī
tad yuddham āsīt tumulaṃ ghoraṃ devāsuropamam
asyatāṃ lokavīrāṇāṃ śaraśaktisamākulam
sa dhanūṃṣi dhvajāgrāṇi varmāṇi ca śirāṃsi ca
ciccheda samare bhīṣmaḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
tasyāti puruṣān anyāṃl lāghavaṃ rathacāriṇaḥ
rakṣaṇaṃ cātmanaḥ saṃkhye śatravo 'py abhyapūjayan
akṣataḥ kṣapayitvānyān asaṃkhyeyaparākramaḥ
ānināya sa kāśyasya sutāḥ sāgaragāsutaḥ
tān vinirjitya tu raṇe sarvaśastraviśāradaḥ
kanyābhiḥ sahitaḥ prāyād bhārato bhāratān prati
tatas taṃ pṛṣṭhato rājañ śālvarājo mahārathaḥ
abhyāhanad ameyātmā bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ raṇe
vāraṇaṃ jaghane nighnan dantābhyām aparo yathā
vāśitām anusaṃprāpto yūthapo balināṃ varaḥ
strīkāma tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti bhīṣmam āha sa pārthivaḥ
śālvarājo mahābāhur amarṣeṇābhicoditaḥ
tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghro bhīṣmaḥ parabalārdanaḥ
sālvarājaṃ susaṃkraddho nyavartata paraṃtapaḥ
tadvākyākulitaḥ krodhād vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan
vitateṣu dhanuṣpāṇir vikuñcitalalāṭabhṛt
dahan yathā kṛṣṇagatiḥ kakṣaṃ vāteritaḥ prabhuḥ
kṣatradharmaṃ samāsthāya vyapetabhayasaṃbhramaḥ
nivartayām āsa rathaṃ śālvaṃ prati mahārathaḥ
nivartamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānaḥ sarva eva te
prekṣakāḥ samapadyanta bhīṣmaśālvasamāgame
tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau balinau vāśitāntare
anyonyam abhivartetāṃ balavikramaśālinau
tataḥ kruddhaḥ śāṃtanavo dṛṣṭvā taṃ nṛpam āgatam
sālveśvaraṃ sa rājānaṃ hayān kruddho 'bhyacodayat
saṃspṛśaṃś ca dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ sajyaṃ kṛtvā nararṣabhaḥ
samavasthāya durdharṣaḥ saśaraḥ saśarāsanaḥ
abhyadravat sālvapatiṃ yuddhāya kurupuṃgavaḥ
kavacī baddhanistriṃśas talabaddhaḥ pratāpavān
tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti rājānaṃ sālvaṃ śāṃtanavo 'bravīt
kanyārthaṃ vai tataḥ sālvaṃ prāvartata mahābalaḥ
tatas tu yuddham abhavat tadā rājan svayaṃvare
bhīṣmasya caiva rājarṣeḥ sālvasyāpi tathaiva ca
āyodha naṃ mahāghoram indralekhāriṇor iva
bhīrūṇāṃ bhītijanakaṃ śūrāṇāṃ harṣavardhanam
surāṇāṃ vismayakaraṃ duṣṭānāṃ prītivardhanam
adṛṣṭam aśrutaṃ kaiś cit sarvalokabhayaṃkaram
tato bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ śaraiḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
śālvarājo naraśreṣṭhaḥ samavākirad āśugaiḥ
vivyādha ca tadā bhīṣmaṃ vāmapārśve stanāntare
tvaramāṇas tvarākāle kṣatriyarṣabhasattamaḥ
pūrvam abhyarditaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmaṃ śālvena te nṛpāḥ
vismitāḥ samapadyanta sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan
lāghavaṃ tasya te dṛṣṭvā saṃyuge sarvapārthivāḥ
apūjayanta saṃhṛṣṭā vāgbhiḥ śālvaṃ narādhipāḥ
kṣatriyāṇāṃ tadā vācaḥ śrutvā parapuraṃjayaḥ
kruddhaḥ śāṃtanavo bhīṣmas tiṣṭha tiṣṭhety abhāṣata
sārathiṃ cābravīt kruddho yāhi yatraiṣa pārthivaḥ
yāvad enaṃ nihanmy adya bhujaṃgam iva pakṣirāṭ
tadvacaḥ sārathiḥ śrutvā yatra śālvas tato yayau
na bhetavyaṃ tvayā sūta tasmāt sālvanṛpātmajāt
paśyatas te vadhiṣyāmi sālveśaṃ paśya me balam
patet tvayi śaraḥ kaś cin nāhaṃ sālvasya śaṃtanuḥ
tato 'straṃ vāruṇaṃ samyag yojayām āsa kauravaḥ
tenāśvāṃś caturo 'mṛdnāc chālvarājño narādhipa
astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya śālvarājñaḥ sa kauravaḥ
bhīṣmo nṛpatiśārdūla nyavadhīt tasya sārathim
ardhacandreṇa bāṇena dhanuś ciccheda jahnujaḥ
astreṇa cāpy athaikena nyavadhīt turagottamān
sālvas tu viratho rājan hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ
nikṣipya ca dhanuḥ śrīmān bhūmau tiṣṭhad avāṅmukhaḥ
kanyāhetor naraśreṣṭha bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavas tadā
jitvā visarjayām āsa jīvantaṃ nṛpasattamam
tataḥ śālvaḥ svanagaraṃ prayayau bharatarṣabha
svarājyam anvaśāc caiva dharmeṇa nṛpatis tadā
rājāno ye ca tatrāsan svayaṃvaradidṛkṣavaḥ
svāny eva te 'pi rāṣṭrāṇi jagmuḥ parapuraṃjaya
te vanāni ca ramyāṇi śailāṃś ca saritas tathā
atikramya ca rājānaḥ svaṃ svaṃ rājyaṃ pracakramuḥ
bhīṣmaḥ svayaṃvare kanyā vijitya kurusattamaḥ
evaṃ vijitya tāḥ kanyā bhīṣmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
nihatyājau nṛpān kāṃś cit kaś cid vidrāvya sainikān
yaśaḥ kīrtiṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ nṛpāṇām apahṛtya ca
prayayau hāstinapuraṃ yatra rājā sa kauravaḥ
. . . . . . . . bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavas tadā
atikramya ca rājānaḥ svaṃ svaṃ rājyaṃ pracakramuḥ
kurukṣetraṃ puṇyatamaṃ
vicitravīryo dharmātmā praśāsti vasudhām imām
yathā pitāsya kauravyaḥ śaṃtanur nṛpasattamaḥ
so 'cireṇaiva kālena atyakrāman narādhipa
vanāni saritaś caiva śailāṃś ca vividhadrumān
akṣataḥ kṣapayitvārīn saṃkhye 'saṃkhyeyavikramaḥ
ānayām āsa kāśyasya sutāḥ sāgaragāsutaḥ
snuṣā iva sa dharmātmā bhaginya iva cānujāḥ
yathā duhitaraś caiva pratigṛhya yayau kurūn
āninye sa mahābāhur bhrātuḥ priyacikīrṣayā
tāḥ sarvā guṇasaṃpannā bhrātā bhrātre yavīyase
bhīṣmo vicitravīryāya pradadau vikramāhṛtāḥ
satāṃ dharmeṇa dharmajñaḥ kṛtvā karmātimānuṣam
bhrātur vicitravīryasya vivāhāyopacakrame
satyavatyā saha mithaḥ kṛtvā niścayam ātmavān
vivāhaṃ kārayiṣyantaṃ bhīṣmaṃ kāśipateḥ sutā
jyeṣṭhā tāsām idaṃ vākyam abravīd dha satī tadā
mayā saubhapatiḥ pūrvaṃ manasābhivṛtaḥ patiḥ
tena cāsmi vṛtā pūrvam eṣa kāmaś ca me pituḥ
mayā varayitavyo 'bhūc chālvas tasmin svayaṃvare
etad vijñāya dharmajña tatas tvaṃ dharmam ācara
evam uktas tayā bhīṣmaḥ kanyayā viprasaṃsadi
cintām abhyagamad vīro yuktāṃ tasyaiva karmaṇaḥ
anyāsaktā tv iyaṃ kanyā jyeṣṭhā kṣātre mayā jitā
vācā dattā manodattā kṛtamaṅgalavācanā
nirdiṣṭā tu parasyaiva sā tyājyā paracintanī
ity uktvā cānumānyaiva bhrātaraṃ svavaśānugam
sa viniścitya dharmajño brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ
anujajñe tadā jyeṣṭām ambāṃ kāśipateḥ sutām
ambikāmbālike bhārye prādād bhrātre yavīyase
bhīṣmo vicitravīryāya vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
tayoḥ pāṇiṃ gṛhītvā sa rūpayauvanadarpitaḥ
vicitravīryo dharmātmā kāmātmā samapadyata

nainām aicchat kathaṃ cana
ambām anyasya kīrtyantīm abravīc cārudarśanām
pratyakṣaphala evaiṣa kāmo 'sādhur nirarthakaḥ
paratantropabhoge mām ārya nāyoktum arhasi
pratiṣṭhitaḥ śaṃtanor vai tāta yasya tvam anvayaḥ
akāmavṛtto dharmātman sādhu manye mataṃ tava
ity uktvāmbāṃ samālokya vidhivad vākyam abravīt
visṛṣṭā hy asi gaccha tvaṃ yathākāmam anindite
nāniyojye samartho 'haṃ niyoktuṃ bhrātaraṃ priyam
anyabhāvagatāṃ cāpi ko nārīṃ vāsayed gṛhe
atas tvāṃ na niyokṣyāmi anyakāmāsi gamyatām
aham apy ūrdhvaretā vai nivṛtto dārakarmaṇi
na saṃbandhas tad āvābhyāṃ bhavitā vai kathaṃ cana
ity uktā sā gatā tatra sakhībhiḥ parivāritā
nirdiṣṭā hi śanai rājan sālvarājapuraṃ prati
athāmbā sālvam āgamya sābravīn manasā vṛtā
purā nirdiṣṭabhāvā tvām āgatāsmi varānana
devavrataṃ samutsṛjya sānujaṃ bharatarṣabham
pratigṛhṇīṣva bhadraṃ te vidhivan māṃ samudyatām
tayaivam uktaḥ sālvo 'pi prahasann idam abravīt
nirjitāsīha bhīṣmeṇa māṃ vinirjitya rājasu
anyena nirjitāṃ bhadre visṛṣṭāṃ tena cālayāt
na gṛhṇāmi varārohe tatra caiva tu gamyatām
ity uktā sā samāgamya bhīṣmaṃ punar athābravīt
ambābravīt tato bhīṣmaṃ tvayāhaṃ sahasā hṛtā
kṣatradharmam avekṣasva tvaṃ bhartā mama dharmataḥ
yāṃ yaḥ svayaṃvare kanyāṃ nirjayec chauryasaṃpadā
rājñaḥ sarvān vinirjitya sa tām udvāhayed dhruvam
atas tvam eva bhartā me tvayāhaṃ nirjitā yataḥ
tasmād vahasva māṃ bhīṣma nirjitāṃ saṃsadi tvayā
ūrdhvaretā hy aham iti pratyuvāca punaḥ punaḥ
bhīṣmaṃ sā cābravīd ambā yathājaiṣīs tathā kuru
evam anvagamad bhīṣmaṃ ṣaṭ samāḥ puṣkarekṣaṇā
ūrdhvaretās tv ahaṃ bhadre vivāhavimukho 'bhavam
tam eva sālvaṃ gaccha tvaṃ yaḥ purā manasā vṛtaḥ
anyasaktaṃ kimarthaṃ tvam ātmānam avadaḥ purā
anyasaktāṃ vadhūṃ kanyāṃ vāsayet svagṛhe na hi
nāham udvāhayiṣye tvāṃ mama bhrātre yavīyase
vicitravīryāya śubhe yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatām iti
bhūyaḥ sālvaṃ samabhyetya rājan gṛhṇīṣva mām iti
nāhaṃ gṛhṇāmy anyajitām iti sālvanirākṛtā
ūrdhvaretās tv aham iti bhīṣmeṇa ca nirākṛtā
ambā bhīṣmaṃ punaḥ sālvaṃ bhīṣmaṃ sālvaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
gamanāgamanenaivam anaiṣīt ṣaṭ samā nṛpa
aśrubhir bhūmim ukṣantī śocantī sā manasvinī
pīnonnatakucadvandvā viśālajaghanekṣaṇā
śroṇībharālasagamā rākācandranibhānanā
varṣatkādambinīmūrdhni sphurantī cañcaleva sā
sā tato dvādaśa samā bāhudāmabhito nadīm
pārśve himavato ramye tapo ghoraṃ samādade
saṃkṣiptakaraṇā tatra tapa āsthāya suvratā
pādāṅguṣṭhena sātiṣṭhad akampanta tataḥ surāḥ
tasyās tat tu tapo dṛṣṭvā surāṇāṃ kṣobhakārakam
vismitaś caiva hṛṣṭaś ca tasyānugrahabuddhimān
anantaseno bhagavān kumāro varadaḥ prabhuḥ
mānayan rājaputrīṃ tāṃ dadau tasyai śubhāṃ srajam
eṣā puṣkariṇī divyā yathāvat samupasthitā
ambe tvacchokaśamanī mālā bhuvi bhaviṣyati
etāṃ caiva mayā dattāṃ mālāṃ yo dhārayiṣyati
so 'sya bhīṣmasya nidhane kāraṇaṃ vai bhaviṣyati
anyapūrveti māṃ sālvo nābhinandati bāliśaḥ
sāhaṃ dharmāc ca kāmāc ca vihīnā śokadhāriṇī
apatiḥ kṣatriyān sarvān ākrandāmi samantataḥ
iyaṃ vaḥ kṣatriyā mālā yā bhīṣmaṃ nihaniṣyati
ahaṃ ca bhāryā tasya syāṃ yo bhīṣmaṃ ghātayiṣyati
tasyāś caṅkramyamāṇāyāḥ samāḥ pañca gatāḥ parāḥ
nābhavac charaṇaṃ kaś cit kṣatriyo bhīṣmajād bhayāt
agacchat somakaṃ sāmbā pāñcāleṣu yaśasvinam
satyasaṃdhaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ satyadharmaparāyaṇam
sā sabhādvāram āgamya pāñcālair abhirakṣitam
pāñcālarājam ākrandat pragṛhya subhujā bhujau
bhīṣmeṇa hanyamānāṃ māṃ majjantīm iva ca hrade
yajñasenābhidhāveha pāṇim ālambya ceśvara
tena me sarvadharmāś ca ratibhogāś ca kevalāḥ
ubhau ca lokau kīrtiś ca samūlau saphalau hṛtau
krośanty evaṃ na vindāmi rājanyaṃ śaraṇaṃ kva cit
kiṃ nu niḥkṣatriyo loko yatrānātho 'vasīdati
samāgamya tu rājāno mayoktā rājasattamāḥ
ikṣvākūṇāṃ tu ye vṛddhāḥ pāñcālānāṃ ca ye varāḥ
tvatprasādād vivāhe 'smin mā dharmo mā parājayet
prasīda yajñaseneha gatir me bhava somaka
jānāmi tvāṃ bodhayāmi rājaputri viśeṣataḥ
yathāśakti yathādharmaṃ balaṃ saṃdhārayāmy aham
anyasmāt pārthivād yat te bhayaṃ syāt pārthivātmaje
tasyāpanayane hetuṃ saṃvidhātum ahaṃ prabhuḥ
na hi śāṃtanavasyāhaṃ mahāstrasya prahāriṇaḥ
īśvaraḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ hi balaṃ dharmo 'nuvartate
sā sādhu vraja kalyāṇi na māṃ bhīṣmo dahed balāt
na hi bhīṣmād ahaṃ dharmaṃ śakto dātuṃ kathaṃ cana
ity uktā srajam āsajya dvāri rājño vyapādravat
vyudastāṃ sarvalokeṣu tapasā saṃśitavratām
tām anvagacchad drupadaḥ sāntvaṃ jalpan punaḥ punaḥ
srajaṃ gṛhāṇa kalyāṇi na no vairaṃ prasañjaya
evam eva tvayā kāryam iti sma pratikāṅkṣate
na tu tasyānyathā bhāvo daivam etad amānuṣam
yaś caināṃ srajam ādāya svayaṃ vai pratimokṣate
sa bhīṣmaṃ samare hantā mama dharmapraṇāśanam
tāṃ srajaṃ drupado rājā kaṃ cit kālaṃ rarakṣa saḥ
tato visrambham āsthāya tūṣṇīm etām upaikṣata
tāṃ śikhaṇḍiny abadhnāt tu bālā pitur avajñayā
tāṃ pitā tv atyajac chīghraṃ trasto bhīṣmasya kilbiṣāt
iṣīkaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhītā sābhyagacchat tapasvinam
gaṅgādvāri tapasyantaṃ tuṣṭihetos tapasvinī
upacārābhituṣṭas tām abravīd ṛṣisattamaḥ
gaṅgādvāre vibhajanaṃ bhavitā nacirād iva
tatra gandharvarājānaṃ tumburuṃ priyadarśanam
ārādhayitum īhasva samyak paricarasva tam
aham apy atra sācivyaṃ kartāsmi tava śobhane
taṃ tadācara bhadraṃ te sa te śreyo vidhāsyati
tato vibhajanaṃ tatra gandharvāṇām avartata
tatra dvāv avaśiṣyetāṃ gandharvāv amitaujasau
tayor ekaḥ samīkṣyaināṃ strībubhūṣur uvāca ha
idaṃ gṛhṇīṣva puṃliṅgaṃ vṛṇe strīliṅgam eva te
niyamaṃ cakratus tatra strī pumāṃś caiva tāv ubhau
tataḥ pumān samabhavac chikhaṇḍī paravīrahā
strī bhūtvā hy apacakrāma sa gandharvo mudānvitaḥ
labdhvā tu mahatīṃ prītiṃ yājñasenir mahāyaśāḥ
tato budbudakaṃ gatvā punar astrāṇi so 'karot
tatra cāstrāṇi divyāni kṛtvā sa sumahādyutiḥ
svadeśam abhisaṃpede pāñcālaṃ kurunandana
so 'bhivādya pituḥ pādau maheṣvāsaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
uvāca bhavatā bhīṣmān na bhetavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
ambāyāṃ nirgatāyāṃ tu bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavas tadā
nyāyena kārayām āsa rājño vaivāhikīṃ kriyām
ambikāmbālike caiva pariṇīyāgnisaṃnidhau
te cāpi bṛhatī śyāme nīlakuñcitamūrdhaje
raktatuṅganakhopete pīnaśroṇipayodhare
ātmanaḥ pratirūpo 'sau labdhaḥ patir iti sthite
vicitravīryaṃ kalyāṇaṃ pūjayām āsatus tu te
anyonyaṃ prītisakte ca ekabhāvāv iva sthite
sa cāśvirūpasadṛśo devasattvaparākramaḥ
sarvāsām eva nārīṇāṃ cittapramathano 'bhavat
tābhyāṃ saha samāḥ sapta viharan pṛthivīpatiḥ
vicitravīryas taruṇo yakṣmāṇaṃ samapadyata
suhṛdāṃ yatamānānām āptaiḥ saha cikitsakaiḥ
jagāmāstam ivādityaḥ kauravyo yamasādanam
dharmātmā sa tu gāṅgeyaś cintāśokaparāyaṇaḥ
pretakāryāṇi sarvāṇi tasya samyag akārayat
rājño vicitravīryasya satyavatyā mate sthitaḥ
ṛtvigbhiḥ sahito bhīṣmaḥ sarvaiś ca kurupuṃgavaiḥ
vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
tataḥ satyavatī dīnā kṛpaṇā putragṛddhinī
putrasya kṛtvā kāryāṇi snuṣābhyāṃ saha bhārata
samāśvāsya snuṣe te ca bhīṣmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
mātā satyavatī bhīṣmam uvāca vadatāṃ varam
dharmaṃ ca pitṛvaṃśaṃ ca mātṛvaṃśaṃ ca māninī
prasamīkṣya mahābhāgā gāṅgeyaṃ vākyam abravīt
duḥkhārditā tu śokena majjantīva ca sāgare
śaṃtanor dharmanityasya kauravyasya yaśasvinaḥ
tvayi piṇḍaś ca kīrtiś ca saṃtānaṃ ca pratiṣṭhitam
bhrātā vicitravīryas te bhūtānām antam eyivān
yathā karma śubhaṃ kṛtvā svargopagamanaṃ dhruvam
yathā cāyur dhruvaṃ satye tvayi dharmas tathā dhruvaḥ
vettha dharmāṃś ca dharmajña samāsenetareṇa ca
vividhās tvaṃ śrutīr vettha vettha vedāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
vyavasthānaṃ ca te dharme kulācāraṃ ca lakṣaye
pratipattiṃ ca kṛcchreṣu śukrāṅgirasayor iva
tasmāt subhṛśam āśvasya tvayi dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
kārye tvāṃ viniyokṣyāmi tac chrutvā kartum arhasi
mama putras tava bhrātā vīryavān supriyaś ca te
bāla eva gataḥ svargam aputraḥ puruṣarṣabha
ime mahiṣyau bhrātus te kāśirājasute śubhe
rūpayauvanasaṃpanne putrakāme ca bhārata
dharmyam etat paraṃ jñātvā
tayor utpādayāpatyaṃ saṃtānāya kulasya naḥ
. . . . . . . . saṃtānakulavardhanam
manniyogān mahābhāga dharmaṃ kartum ihārhasi
rājye caivābhiṣicyasva bhāratān anuśādhi ca
dārāṃś ca kuru dharmeṇa mā nimajjīḥ pitāmahān
agnihotraṃ trayo vedāḥ saṃtānam api cākṣayam
eṣā trayī tu saṃproktā svargamokṣaphalapradā
tathocyamāno mātrā ca suhṛdbhiś ca paraṃtapaḥ
pratyuvāca sa dharmātmā dharmyam evottaraṃ vacaḥ
asaṃśayaṃ paro dharmas tvayā mātar udāhṛtaḥ
tvam apatyaṃ prati ca me pratijñāṃ vettha vai parām
rājyārthe nābhiṣicyeyaṃ nopeyāṃ jātu maithunam
bhavatyā matam ājñāya kṛtam etad vrataṃ mayā
jānāsi ca yathāvṛttaṃ śulkahetos tvadantare
sa satyavati satyaṃ te pratijānāmy ahaṃ punaḥ
parityajeyaṃ trailokyaṃ rājyaṃ deveṣu vā punaḥ
yad vāpy adhikam etābhyāṃ na tu satyaṃ kathaṃ cana
tyajec ca pṛthivī gandham āpaś ca rasam ātmanaḥ
jyotis tathā tyajed rūpaṃ vāyuḥ sparśaguṇaṃ tyajet
prabhāṃ samutsṛjed arko dhūmaketus tathoṣṇatām
tyajec chabdaṃ tathākāśaḥ somaḥ śītāṃśutāṃ tyajet
vikramaṃ vṛtrahā jahyād dharmaṃ jahyāc ca dharmarāṭ
na tv ahaṃ satyam utsraṣṭuṃ vyavaseyaṃ kathaṃ cana
tan na jātv anyathā kāryaṃ lokānām api saṃkṣaye
amaratvasya vā hetos trailokyasadanasya vā
evam uktā tu putreṇa bhūridraviṇatejasā
mātā satyavatī bhīṣmam uvāca tadanantaram
jānāmi te sthitiṃ satye parāṃ satyaparākrama
icchan sṛjethās trīṃl lokān anyāṃs tvaṃ svena tejasā
jānāmi caiva satyaṃ tan madarthaṃ yad abhāṣathāḥ
āpaddharmam avekṣasva vaha paitāmahīṃ dhuram
yathā te kulatantuś ca dharmaś ca na parābhavet
suhṛdaś ca prahṛṣyeraṃs tathā kuru paraṃtapa
ātmanaś ca hitaṃ tāta priyaṃ ca mama bhārata
lālapyamānāṃ tām evaṃ kṛpaṇāṃ putragṛddhinīm
dharmād apetaṃ bruvatīṃ bhīṣmo bhūyo 'bravīd idam
rājñi dharmān avekṣasva mā naḥ sarvān vyanīnaśaḥ
satyāc cyutiḥ kṣatriyasya na dharmeṣu praśasyate
śaṃtanor api saṃtānaṃ yathā syād akṣayaṃ bhuvi
tat te dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi kṣātraṃ rājñi sanātanam
śrutvā taṃ pratipadyethāḥ prājñaiḥ saha purohitaiḥ
āpaddharmārthakuśalair lokatantram avekṣya ca
bhīṣma uvāca
jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa pitur vadham amṛṣyatā
rājā paraśuhastena
kruddhena ca mahābhāge haihayādhipatir hataḥ
. . . . . . . . hehayasya mahātmanaḥ
śatāni daśa bāhūnāṃ nikṛttāny arjunasya vai
punaś ca dhanur ādāya mahāstrāṇi pramuñcatā
nirdagdhaṃ kṣatram asakṛd rathena jayatā mahīm
evam uccāvacair astrair bhārgaveṇa mahātmanā
triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivī kṛtā niḥkṣatriyā purā
evaṃ niḥkṣatriye loke kṛte tena maharṣiṇā
tataḥ saṃbhūya sarvābhiḥ kṣatriyābhiḥ samantataḥ
utpāditāny apatyāni brāhmaṇair niyatātmabhiḥ
pāṇigrāhasya tanaya iti vedeṣu niścitam
dharmaṃ manasi saṃsthāpya brāhmaṇāṃs tāḥ samabhyayuḥ
loke 'py ācarito dṛṣṭaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ punarbhavaḥ
tataḥ punaḥ samuditaṃ kṣatraṃ samabhavat tadā
imaṃ caivātra vakṣye 'ham itihāsaṃ purātanam
athotathya iti khyāta āsīd dhīmān ṛṣiḥ purā
mamatā nāma tasyāsīd bhāryā paramasaṃmatā
utathyasya yavīyāṃs tu purodhās tridivaukasām
bṛhaspatir bṛhattejā mamatāṃ so 'nvapadyata
uvāca mamatā taṃ tu devaraṃ vadatāṃ varam
antarvatnī ahaṃ bhrātrā jyeṣṭhenāramyatām iti
ayaṃ ca me mahābhāga kukṣāv eva bṛhaspate
autathyo vedam atraiva ṣaḍaṅgaṃ pratyadhīyata
amogharetās tvaṃ cāpi nūnaṃ bhavitum arhasi
tasmād evaṃgate 'dya tvam upāramitum arhasi
evam uktas tayā samyag bṛhattejā bṛhaspatiḥ
kāmātmānaṃ tadātmānaṃ na śaśāka niyacchitum
saṃbabhūva tataḥ kāmī tayā sārdham akāmayā
utsṛjantaṃ tu taṃ retaḥ sa garbhastho 'bhyabhāṣata
bhos tāta kanyasa vade dvayor nāsty atra saṃbhavaḥ
amoghaśukraś ca bhavān pūrvaṃ cāham ihāgataḥ
amogharetāś ca bhavān na pīḍāṃ kartum arhati
aśrutvaiva tu tad vākyaṃ garbhasthasya bṛhaspatiḥ
jagāma maithunāyaiva mamatāṃ cārulocanām
śukrotsargaṃ tato buddhvā tasyā garbhagato muniḥ
padbhyām ārodhayan mārgaṃ śukrasya ca bṛhaspateḥ
sthānam aprāptam atha tac chukraṃ pratihataṃ tadā
papāta sahasā bhūmau tataḥ kruddho bṛhaspatiḥ
śaśāpa taṃ tataḥ kruddha evam ukto bṛhaspatiḥ
utathyaputraṃ garbhasthaṃ nirbhartsya bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
yasmāt tvam īdṛśe kāle sarvabhūtepsite sati
evam āttha vacas tasmāt tamo dīrghaṃ pravekṣyasi
sa vai dīrghatamā nāma śāpād ṛṣir ajāyata
bṛhaspater bṛhatkīrter bṛhaspatir ivaujasā
jātyandho vedavit prājñaḥ patnīṃ lebhe svavidyayā
taruṇīṃ rūpasaṃpannāṃ pradveṣīṃ nāma brāhmaṇīm
sa putrāñ janayām āsa gautamādīn mahāyaśāḥ
ṛṣer utathyasya tadā saṃtānakulavṛddhaye
dharmātmā ca mahātmā ca vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ
godharmaṃ saurabheyāc ca so 'dhītya nikhilaṃ muniḥ
prāvartata tathā kartuṃ śraddhāvāṃs tam aśaṅkayā
tato vitathamaryādaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā munisattamāḥ
kruddhā mohābhibhūtās te sarve tatrāśramaukasaḥ
aho 'yaṃ bhinnamaryādo nāśrame vastum arhati
tasmād enaṃ vayaṃ sarve pāpātmānaṃ tyajāmahe
ity anyonyaṃ samābhāṣya te dīrghatamasaṃ munim

putralābhāc ca sā patnī na tutoṣa patiṃ tadā
pradviṣantīṃ patir bhāryāṃ kiṃ māṃ dveṣṭīti cābravīt
patir bhāryānubharaṇād bhartā ceti prakīrtyate
ahaṃ tvāṃ bharaṇaṃ kṛtvā jātyandhaṃ sasutā sadā
nityakālaṃ śrameṇārtā na bhareyaṃ mahātapaḥ
tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā ṛṣiḥ kopasamanvitaḥ
pratyuvāca tataḥ patnīṃ pradveṣīṃ sasutāṃ tadā
nīyatāṃ kṣatriyakule dhanārthī tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
tvayā dattaṃ dhanaṃ vipra neccheyaṃ duḥkhakārakam
yatheṣṭaṃ kuru viprendra na bhareyaṃ yathā purā
adya prabhṛti maryādā mayā loke pratiṣṭhitā
eka eva patir nāryā yāvajjīvaṃ parāyaṇam
mṛte jīvati vā tasmin nāparaṃ prāpnuyān naram
abhigamya paraṃ nārī patiṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
apatīnāṃ tu nārīṇām adya prabhṛti pātakam
yady asti ced dhanaṃ sarvaṃ vṛthābhogā bhavantu tāḥ
akīrtiḥ parivādaś ca nityakālaṃ bhavantu vai
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇī bhṛśakopitā
gaṅgām ānīyatām eṣa putrā ity evam abravīt
lobhamohābhibhūtās te putrās taṃ gautamādayaḥ
kāṣṭhe samudge prakṣipya gaṅgāyāṃ samavāsṛjan
na syād andhaś ca vṛddhaś ca bhartavyo 'yam iti sma te
karmaṇy atha tataḥ krūre teṣāṃ buddhir ajāyata
cintayitvā tataḥ krūrāḥ pratijagmur atho gṛhān
so 'nusrotas tadā rājan plavamāna ṛṣis tataḥ
jagāma subahūn deśān andhas tenoḍupena ha
taṃ tu rājā balir nāma sarvadharmaviśāradaḥ
apaśyan majjanagataḥ srotasābhyāśam āgatam
jagrāha cainaṃ dharmātmā baliḥ satyaparākramaḥ
jñātvā cainaṃ sa vavre 'tha putrārthaṃ manujarṣabha
taṃ pūjayitvā rājarṣir viśrāntaṃ munim abravīt
saṃtānārthaṃ mahābhāga bhāryāsu mama mānada
putrān dharmārthakuśalān utpādayitum arhasi
evam uktaḥ sa tejasvī taṃ tathety uktavān ṛṣiḥ
tasmai sa rājā svāṃ bhāryāṃ sudeṣṇāṃ prāhiṇot tadā
andhaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca taṃ matvā na sā devī jagāma ha
svāṃ tu dhātreyikāṃ tasmai vṛddhāya prāhiṇot tadā
tasyāṃ kākṣīvadādīn sa śūdrayonāv ṛṣir vaśī
janayām āsa dharmātmā putrān ekādaśaiva tu
kākṣīvadādīn putrāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā sarvān adhīyataḥ
mudā ca tān balī rājā dṛṣṭvā kakṣīvadādikān
uvāca tam ṛṣiṃ rājā mamaita iti vīryavān
nety uvāca maharṣis taṃ mamaivaita iti bruvan
śūdrayonau mayā hīme jātāḥ kākṣīvadādayaḥ
andhaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca māṃ matvā sudeṣṇā mahiṣī tava
avamanya dadau mūḍhā śūdrāṃ dhātreyikāṃ hi me
tataḥ prasādayām āsa punas tam ṛṣisattamam
baliḥ sudeṣṇāṃ bhāryāṃ ca tasmai tāṃ prāhiṇot punaḥ
tāṃ sa dīrghatamāṅgeṣu spṛṣṭvā devīm athābravīt
bhaviṣyati kumāras te tejasvī satyavāg iti
tatrāṅgo nāma rājarṣiḥ sudeṣṇāyām ajāyata
aṅgo vaṅgaḥ kaliṅgaś ca puṇḍraḥ suhmaś ca te sutāḥ
teṣāṃ deśāḥ samākhyātāḥ svanāmakathitā bhuvi
aṅgasyāṅgo 'bhavad deśo vaṅgo vaṅgasya ca smṛtaḥ
kaliṅgaviṣayaś caiva kaliṅgasya ca sa smṛtaḥ
puṇḍrasya puṇḍrāḥ prakhyātāḥ suhmāḥ suhmasya ca smṛtāḥ
evaṃ baleḥ purā vaṃśaḥ prakhyāto vai maharṣijaḥ
evam anye maheṣvāsā brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyā bhuvi
jātāḥ paramadharmajñā vīryavanto mahābalāḥ
etac chrutvā tvam apy atra mātaḥ kuru yathepsitam

vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
bhīṣmasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā dharmyaṃ hetvarthasaṃhitam
mātā satyavatī bhīṣmaṃ punar evābhyabhāṣata
aucathyam adhikṛtyedam aṅgaṃ ca yad udāhṛtam
paurāṇī śrutir ity eṣā prāptakālam idaṃ kuru
tvaṃ hi putra kulasyāsya jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaś ca bhārata
yathā ca te pitur vākyaṃ mama kāryaṃ tavānagha
mama putras tava bhrātā yavīyān supriyaś ca te
bāla eva gataḥ svargaṃ bhārato bharatarṣabha
ime mahiṣyau tasyeha kāśirājasute ubhe
rūpayauvanasaṃpanne putrakāme ca bhārata
dharmam etat paraṃ jñātvā saṃtānāya kulasya ca
ābhyāṃ mama niyogāt tu dharmaṃ caritum arhasi
asaṃśayaṃ paro dharmas tvayā mātaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
tvam apy etāṃ pratijñāṃ tu vettha yā paramā mayi
jānīṣe yat tadā vṛttaṃ śulkahetos tvadantare
tat satyavati satyaṃ vai punar eva bravīmi te
tan na jātv anyathā kāryaṃ lokānām api saṃkṣaye
parityajeyaṃ trailokyaṃ rājyaṃ deveṣu vā punaḥ
yad vābhyadhikam etābhyāṃ na tu satyaṃ parityaje
tyajec ca pṛthivī gandham āpaś ca rasam uttamam
jyotiś ca paramaṃ rūpaṃ vāyuḥ sparśaguṇaṃ tyajet
tyajec ca ghoṣam ākāśaḥ somaḥ śītatvam utsṛjet
prabhāṃ samutsṛjed arko dhūmaketur athoṣṇatām
vṛtrahā vikramaṃ jahyād dharmaṃ jahyāc ca dharmarāṭ
amaratvasya vā hetos trailokyasadanasya vā
utsṛjeyam ahaṃ prāṇān na tu satyaṃ kathaṃ cana
jānāmi tvayi dharmajña satyaṃ satyavatāṃ vara
icchaṃs tvam iha lokāṃs trīn sṛjer anyān ariṃdama
yathā tu vaḥ kulaṃ caiva dharmaś ca na parābhavet
suhṛdaś ca suhṛṣṭāḥ syus tathā tvaṃ kartum arhasi
tvam eva kulavṛddhāsi gauravaṃ tu paraṃ tvayi
sopāyaṃ kulasaṃtāne vaktum arhasi naḥ param
striyo hi paramaṃ guhyaṃ dhārayanti kule kule
puruṣāṃś cāpi māyābhir bahvībhir upagṛhṇate
sā satyavati saṃpaśya dharmaṃ satyaparāyaṇe
yathā na jahyāṃ satyaṃ ca na sīdec ca kulaṃ hi naḥ
satyam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhārata
viśvāsāt te pravakṣyāmi saṃtānāya kulasya ca
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
evam uktvā tato bhīṣmaṃ taṃ mātā pratyabhāṣata
rocate me vacas tubhyaṃ mamāpi vacanaṃ śṛṇu
na te śakyam anākhyātum āpad dhīyaṃ tathāvidhā
tvam eva naḥ kule dharmas tvaṃ satyaṃ tvaṃ parā gatiḥ
yat tvaṃ vakṣyasi tat kāryam asmābhir iti me matiḥ
yan me bālye purā vṛttaṃ kumāryās tac chṛṇuṣva me
tasmān niśamya vākyaṃ me kuruṣva yad anantaram
śṛṇu bhīṣma vaco mahyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam
na ca visrambhakathitaṃ bhavān sūcitum arhati
yas tu rājā vasur nāma śrutas te bharatarṣabha
tasya śuklād ahaṃ matsyā dhṛtā kukṣau purā kila
mātaraṃ me jalād dhṛtvā dāśaḥ paramadharmavit
māṃ tu svagṛham ānīya duhitṛtve hy akalpayat
dharmayuktasya dharmātman pitur āsīt tarī mama
sā kadā cid ahaṃ tatra gatā prathamayauvane
atārayaṃ janaṃ tatra pāragāminam añjasā
atha dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ paramarṣiḥ parāśaraḥ
ājagāma tarīṃ dhīmāṃs tariṣyan yamunāṃ nadīm
sa tāryamāṇo yamunāṃ mām upetyābravīt tadā
sāntvapūrvaṃ muniśreṣṭhaḥ kāmārto madhuraṃ bahu
uktvā janmakulaṃ mahyaṃ nāsi dāśasuteti ca
tam ahaṃ śāpabhītā ca pitur bhītā ca bhārata
varair asulabhair uktā na pratyākhyātum utsahe
prekṣya tāṃs tu mahābhāgān pare pāre ṛṣīn sthitān
yamunātīravinyastān pradīptān iva pāvakān
purastād aruṇaś caiva taruṇaḥ saṃprakāśate
yenaiṣā tāmravastreva dyauḥ kṛtā pravijṛmbhitā
uktamātro mayā tatra nīhāram asṛjat prabhuḥ
parāśaraḥ satyadhṛtir dvīpe ca yamunāmbhasi
abhibhūya sa māṃ bālāṃ tejasā vaśam ānayat
tamasā lokam āvṛtya naugatām eva bhārata
matsyagandho mahān āsīt purā mama jugupsitaḥ
tam apāsya śubhaṃ gandham imaṃ prādāt sa me muniḥ
kanyātvaṃ ca dadau prītaḥ punar vidvāṃs tapodhanaḥ
tasya vīryam ahaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā yuktaṃ mahātmanaḥ
vismitā vyathitā caiva prādām ātmānam eva ca
vasiṣṭhena samānītā yājñavalkyādayo dvijāḥ
kṛtvā vivāhaṃ me sarve pratijagmur yathāgatam
tatas tadā mahātmā sa kanyāyāṃ mayi bhārata
prahṛṣṭo 'janayat putraṃ dvīpa eva parāśaraḥ
himaṃ caivāsṛjad dhīmān dvīpaṃ ca yamunāmbhasi
tataḥ pitā vasuś caiva pitaraś ca tapodhanāḥ
tato mām āha sa munir garbham utsṛjya māmakam
dvīpe 'syā eva saritaḥ kanyaiva tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
evam uktvā gataḥ so 'tha ṛṣiḥ paramadharmavit
mamāpi prasavo jātas tatkṣaṇād eva bhārata
pārāśaryo mahāyogī sa babhūva mahān ṛṣiḥ
kanyāputro mama purā dvaipāyana iti smṛtaḥ
yo vyasya vedāṃś caturas tapasā bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
loke vyāsatvam āpede kārṣṇyāt kṛṣṇatvam eva ca
satyavādī śamaparas tapasvī dagdhakilbiṣaḥ
sadyotpannaḥ sa tu mahān saha pitrā tato gataḥ
sa niyukto mayā vyaktaṃ tvayā ca amitadyute
bhrātuḥ kṣetreṣu kalyāṇam apatyaṃ janayiṣyati
sa hi mām uktavāṃs tatra smareḥ kṛtyeṣu mām iti
taṃ smariṣye mahābāho yadi bhīṣma tvam icchasi
tava cānumate kāmam ābhyām utpādayet prajāḥ
tava hy anumate bhīṣma niyataṃ sa mahātapāḥ
vicitravīryakṣetreṣu putrān utpādayiṣyati
ity uktamātre bhīṣmas tu mūrdhny añjalikṛto 'hṛṣat
sarvavit sarvakartā ca yady etat tat karoti ca
maharṣeḥ kīrtane tasya bhīṣmaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
deśakālau tu jānāmi kriyatām arthasiddhaye
dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca trīn etān yo 'nupaśyati
artham arthānubandhaṃ ca dharmaṃ dharmānubandhanam
kāmaṃ kāmānubandhaṃ ca viparītān pṛthak pṛthak
śubhaṃ śubhānubaṃdhaṃ ca tāṃś caiva trividhān punaḥ
yo vicintya dhiyā samyag vyavasyati sa buddhimān
punaḥ punar yo vicintya dhiyā samyag vyavasyati
sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa naraḥ kṛtsnakarmakṛt
tad idaṃ dharmayuktaṃ ca hitaṃ caiva kulasya naḥ
uktaṃ bhavatyā yac chreyaḥ paramaṃ rocate mama
tatas tasmin pratijñāte bhīṣmeṇa kurunandana
kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ kālī cintayām āsa vai munim
tasyāḥ sa cintitaṃ jñātvā satyavatyā mahātapāḥ
sa vedān vibruvan dhīmān mātur vijñāya cintitam
prādurbabhūvāviditaḥ kṣaṇena kurunandana
tasmai pūjāṃ tadā dattvā sutāya vidhipūrvakam
pariṣvajya ca bāhubhyāṃ prasnavair abhiṣicya ca
mumoca bāṣpaṃ dāśeyī putraṃ dṛṣṭvā cirasya tam
tām adbhiḥ pariṣicyārtāṃ maharṣir abhivādya ca
mātaraṃ pūrvajaḥ putro vyāso vacanam abravīt
bhavatyā yad abhipretaṃ tad ahaṃ kartum āgataḥ
śādhi māṃ dharmatattvajñe karavāṇi priyaṃ tava
tasmai pūjāṃ tato 'kārṣīt purodhāḥ paramarṣaye
sa ca tāṃ pratijagrāha vidhivan mantrapūrvakam
pūjito mantrapūrvaṃ tu vidhivat prītim āpa saḥ
tam āsanagataṃ mātā pṛṣṭvā kuśalam avyayam
ācacakṣe krameṇāsmai tadartham abhicintitam
satyavaty abhivīkṣyainam uvācedam anantaram
mātāpitroḥ prajāyante putrāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ kave
teṣāṃ pitā yathā svāmī tathā mātā na saṃśayaḥ
vidhātṛvihitaḥ sa tvaṃ yathā me prathamaḥ sutaḥ
vicitravīryo brahmarṣe tathā me 'varajaḥ sutaḥ
yathaiva pitṛto bhīṣmas tathā tvam api mātṛtaḥ
bhrātā vicitravīryasya yathā vā putra manyase
ayaṃ śāṃtanavaḥ satyaṃ pālayan satyavikramaḥ
buddhiṃ na kurute 'patye tathā rājyānuśāsane
sa tvaṃ vyapekṣayā bhrātuḥ saṃtānāya kulasya ca
bhīṣmasya cāsya vacanān niyogāc ca mamānagha
anukrośāc ca bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ rakṣaṇāya ca
ānṛśaṃsyena yad brūyāṃ tac chrutvā kartum arhasi
yavīyasas tava bhrātur bhārye surasutopame
rūpayauvanasaṃpanne putrakāme ca dharmataḥ
tayor utpādayāpatyaṃ samartho hy asi putraka
anurūpaṃ kulasyāsya saṃtatyāḥ prasavasya ca
vyāsa uvāca
vettha dharmaṃ satyavati paraṃ cāparam eva ca
yathā ca tava dharmajñe dharme praṇihitā matiḥ
tasmād ahaṃ tvanniyogād dharmam uddiśya kāraṇam
īpsitaṃ te kariṣyāmi dṛṣṭaṃ hy etat purātanam
bhrātuḥ putrān pradāsyāmi mitrāvaruṇayoḥ samān
vrataṃ caretāṃ te devyau nirdiṣṭam iha yan mayā
saṃvatsaraṃ yathānyāyaṃ tataḥ śuddhe bhaviṣyataḥ
na hi mām avratopetā upeyāt kā cid aṅganā
na hi mām arhataḥ prāptum aśuddhe kosalātmaje
evaṃ satyavatī dharmaṃ paramaṃ jñātum arhasi
satyavaty uvāca
yathā sadyaḥ prapadyeta devī garbhaṃ tathā kuru
arājakeṣu rāṣṭreṣu nāsti vṛṣṭir na devatāḥ
. . . . . . . . prajānāthā vinaśyati
naśyanti ca kriyāḥ sarvāḥ
katham arājakaṃ rāṣṭraṃ śakyaṃ dhārayituṃ prabho
tasmād garbhaṃ samādhatsva bhīṣmas taṃ vardhayiṣyati
vyāsa uvāca
yadi putraḥ pradātavyo mayā kṣipram akālikam
virūpatāṃ me sahatām etad asyāḥ paraṃ vratam
yadi me sahate gandhaṃ rūpaṃ veṣaṃ tathā vapuḥ
adyaiva garbhaṃ kausalyā viśiṣṭaṃ pratipadyatām
tasya cāpi śataṃ putrā bhavitāro na saṃśayaḥ
goptāraḥ kuruvaṃśasya bhavatyāḥ śokanāśanāḥ
vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
evam uktvā mahātejā vyāsaḥ satyavatīṃ tadā
śayane tv atha kausalyā śucivastrā svalaṃkṛtā
samāgamanam ākāṅkṣann iti so 'ntarhito muniḥ
tato 'bhigamya sā devī snuṣāṃ rahasi saṃgatām
dharmyam arthasamāyuktam uvāca vacanaṃ hitam
kausalye dharmatantraṃ yad bravīmi tvāṃ nibodha me
bharatānāṃ samucchedo vyaktaṃ madbhāgyasaṃkṣayāt
vyathitāṃ māṃ ca saṃprekṣya pitṛvaṃśaṃ ca pīḍitam
bhīṣmo buddhim adān me 'tra dharmasya ca vivṛddhaye
ahaṃ tvām adya vakṣyāmi buddhyā niścitya bhāmini
śrutvā tu tadvacaḥ subhru kartum arhasi nānyathā
sā ca buddhis tavādhīnā putri jñātaṃ mayeti ha
naṣṭaṃ ca bhārataṃ vaṃśaṃ punar eva samuddhara
garbhaṃ dhāraya kalyāṇi devarasya mahātmanaḥ
putraṃ janaya suśroṇi devarājasamaprabham
sa hi rājyadhuraṃ gurvīm udvakṣyati kulasya naḥ
evam uktvā tu sā devī snuṣāṃ satyavatī tadā
sā dharmato 'nunīyaināṃ kathaṃ cid dharmacāriṇīm
bhojayām āsa viprāṃś ca devarṣīn atithīṃs tathā
vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
tataḥ satyavatī kāle vadhūṃ snātām ṛtau tadā
saṃveśayantī śayane śanakair vākyam abravīt
kausalye devaras te 'sti so 'dya tvānupravekṣyati
apramattā pratīkṣainaṃ niśīthe āgamiṣyati
śvaśrvās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā śayānā śayane śubhe
sācintayat tadā bhīṣmam anyāṃś ca kurupuṃgavān
tataḥ suptajanaprāye niśīthe bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
tato 'mbikāyāṃ prathamaṃ niyuktaḥ satyavāg ṛṣiḥ
dīpyamāneṣu dīpeṣu śayanaṃ praviveśa ha
satyavatyā niyuktas tu satyavāg ṛṣisattamaḥ
jagāma tasyāḥ śayanaṃ vipule tapasi sthitaḥ
tasya kṛṣṇasya kapilā jaṭā dīpte ca locane
babhrūṇi caiva śmaśrūṇi dṛṣṭvā devī nyamīlayat
taṃ samīkṣya tu kausalyā duṣprekṣyam atathocitā
virūpam iti vitrastā saṃkucyāsīn nimīlitā
virūpo hi jaṭī cāpi durvarṇaḥ puruṣaḥ kṛśaḥ
sugandhetaragandhaś ca sarvathā duṣpradharṣaṇaḥ
saṃbabhūva tayā rātrau mātuḥ priyacikīrṣayā
bhayāt kāśisutā taṃ tu nāśaknod abhivīkṣitum
tato niṣkrāntam āsādya mātā putram athābravīt
apy asyāṃ guṇavān putra rājaputro bhaviṣyati
ity uktaḥ so 'bravīn mātaḥ kumāro mātṛdoṣataḥ
andho nāgāyutaprāṇo bhaviṣyaty ambikodarāt
niśamya tad vaco mātur vyāsaḥ paramabuddhimān
provācātīndriyajñāno vidhinā saṃpracoditaḥ
nāgāyutasamaprāṇo vidvān rājarṣisattamaḥ
mahābhāgo mahāvīryo mahābuddhir bhaviṣyati
tasya cāpi śataṃ putrā bhaviṣyanti mahābalāḥ
kiṃ tu mātuḥ sa vaiguṇyād andha eva bhaviṣyati
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā mātā putram athābravīt
alabdhalābhaḥ putro 'yaṃ yady andho vai bhaviṣyati
asya vaṃśasya goptāraṃ satāṃ śokavināśanam
tasmād avarajaṃ putraṃ janayānyaṃ narādhipam
bhrātur bhāryāparā ceyaṃ rūpayauvanaśālinī
asyām utpādayāpatyaṃ manniyogād guṇādhikam
nāndhaḥ kurūṇāṃ nṛpatir anurūpas tapodhana
jñātivaṃśasya goptāraṃ pitṝṇāṃ vaṃśavardhanam
dvitīyaṃ kuruvaṃśasya rājānaṃ dātum arhasi
sa tatheti pratijñāya niścakrāma mahātapāḥ
sāpi kālena kausalyā suṣuve 'ndhaṃ tam ātmajam
ambālikāṃ samādhāya tasyāṃ satyavatī sutam
bhūyo niyojayām āsa saṃtānāya kulasya vai
viṣaṇṇāmbālikā sādhvī niṣaṇṇā śayanottame
ko nv eṣyatīti dhyāyantī niyatā saṃpratīkṣate
dhṛtarāṣṭra yatas tena dhṛtarāṣṭras tato 'bhavat
punar eva tu sā devī paribhāṣya snuṣāṃ tataḥ
ṛṣim āvāhayat satyā yathāpūrvam aninditā
tatas tenaiva vidhinā maharṣis tām apadyata
ambālikām athābhyāgād ṛṣiṃ dṛṣṭvā ca sāpi tam
viṣaṇṇā pāṇḍusaṃkāśā samapadyata bhārata
tāṃ bhītāṃ pāṇḍusaṃkāśāṃ viṣaṇṇāṃ prekṣya pārthiva
vyāsaḥ satyavatīputra idaṃ vacanam abravīt
yasmāt pāṇḍutvam āpannā virūpaṃ prekṣya mām api
tasmād eṣa sutas tubhyaṃ pāṇḍur eva bhaviṣyati
nāma cāsya tad eveha bhaviṣyati śubhānane
ity uktvā sa nirākrāmad bhagavān ṛṣisattamaḥ
tato niṣkrāntam ālokya satyā putram abhāṣata
apy asya guṇavān putra rājaputro bhaviṣyati
kumāro brūhi me putra asty atra bhavitā śubhaḥ
śaśaṃsa sa punar mātre tasya bālasya pāṇḍutām
tam uvāca tato mātā apy atra bhavitā śubhaḥ
kumāro brūhi me tattvam ṛṣis tāṃ pratyuvāca ha
bhaviṣyati suvikrāntaḥ kumāro dikṣu viśrutaḥ
pāṇḍutvaṃ varṇatas tasya mātṛdoṣād bhaviṣyati
taṃ mātā punar evānyam ekaṃ putram ayācata
tatheti ca maharṣis tāṃ mātaraṃ pratyabhāṣata
tataḥ kumāraṃ sā devī prāptakālam ajījanat
pāṇḍuṃ lakṣaṇasaṃpannaṃ dīpyamānam iva śriyā
tasya putrā maheṣvāsā jajñire pañca pāṇḍavāḥ
tasya putrā maheṣvāsā janiṣyantīha pañca vai
ity uktvā mātaraṃ tatra so 'bhivādya jagāma ha
munau yāte 'mbikā putraṃ mahābhāgam asūyata
dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ mahāprājñaṃ prajñācakṣuṣam īśvaram
anujāmbālikā tatra putraṃ kāle vyajāyata
pāṇḍuṃ lakṣaṇasaṃpannaṃ dīpyamānaṃ śriyāvṛtam
tayor janmakriyāḥ sarvā yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ
kārayām āsa vai bhīṣmo brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ
andhaṃ dṛṣṭvāmbikāputraṃ jātaṃ satyavatī sutam
kausalyārthe samāhūya putram anyam ayācata
andho 'yam anyam icchāmi kausalyātanayaṃ śubham
evam ukto maharṣis tāṃ mātaraṃ pratyabhāṣata
niyatā yadi kausalyā bhaviṣyati punaḥ śubhā
bhaviṣyati kumāro 'syāṃ dharmaśāstrārthatattvavit
tāṃ samādhāya vai bhūyaḥ snuṣāṃ satyavatī tadā
ṛtukāle tato jyeṣṭhāṃ vadhūṃ tasmai nyayojayat
sā tu rūpaṃ ca gandhaṃ ca maharṣeḥ pravicintya tam
nākarod vacanaṃ devyā bhayāt surasutopamā
tataḥ svair bhūṣaṇair dāsīṃ bhūṣayitvāpsaropamām
preṣayām āsa kṛṣṇāya tataḥ kāśipateḥ sutā
dāsī ṛṣim anuprāptaṃ pratyudgamyābhivādya ca
saṃviveśābhyanujñātā satkṛtyopacacāra ha
upacāreṇa śīlena rūpayauvanasaṃpadā
vāgbhāvopapradānena gātrasaṃsparśanena ca
kāmopabhogena tu sa tasyāṃ tuṣṭim agād ṛṣiḥ
tayā sahoṣito rātriṃ maharṣiḥ prīyamāṇayā
uttiṣṭhann abravīd enām abhujiṣyā bhaviṣyasi
ayaṃ ca te śubhe garbhaḥ śrīmān udaram āgataḥ
dharmātmā bhavitā loke sarvabuddhimatāṃ varaḥ
sa jajñe viduro nāma kṛṣṇadvaipāyanātmajaḥ
dhṛtarāṣṭrasya ca bhrātā pāṇḍoś cāmitabuddhimān
dharmo vidurarūpeṇa śāpāt tasya mahātmanaḥ
māṇḍavyasyārthatattvajñaḥ kāmakrodhavivarjitaḥ
kṛṣṇadvaipāyano 'py etat satyavatyai nyavedayat
pralambham ātmanaś caiva śūdrāyāḥ putrajanma ca
sa dharmasyānṛṇo bhūtvā punar mātrā sametya ca
tasyai garbhaṃ samāvedya tatraivāntaradhīyata
evaṃ vicitravīryasya kṣetre dvaipāyanād api
jajñire devagarbhābhāḥ kuruvaṃśavivardhanāḥ
teṣu triṣu kumāreṣu jāteṣu kurujāṅgalam
kuravo 'tha kurukṣetraṃ sarvaṃ trayam avardhata
gandhavatyā tathaivokto dharmarūpaṃ sutaṃ prati
nāham asmi punar yoktuṃ śakto mātaḥ sutaṃ prati
janamejaya uvāca
kiṃ kṛtaṃ karma dharmeṇa yena śāpam upeyivān
kasya śāpāc ca brahmarṣe śūdrayonāv ajāyata
vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
babhūva brāhmaṇaḥ kaś cin māṇḍavya iti viśrutaḥ
dhṛtimān sarvadharmajñaḥ satye tapasi ca sthitaḥ
sa tīrthayātrāṃ vicarañ jagāma ca yadṛcchayā
saṃnikṛṣṭāni tīrthāni grāmāṇāṃ yāni kāni cit
tatrāśramapadaṃ kṛtvā vasati sma mahāmuniḥ
sa āśramapadadvāri vṛkṣamūle mahātapāḥ
ūrdhvabāhur mahāyogī tasthau maunavratānvitaḥ
tasya kālena mahatā tasmiṃs tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ
tam āśramapadaṃ prāptā dasyavo loptrahāriṇaḥ
anusāryamāṇā bahubhī rakṣibhir bharatarṣabha
tām eva vasatiṃ jagmus tadgrāmāl loptrahāriṇaḥ
te tasyāvasathe loptraṃ nidadhuḥ kurusattama
nidhāya ca bhayāl līnās tatraivānvāgate bale
teṣu līneṣv atho śīghraṃ tatas tad rakṣiṇāṃ balam
tataḥ śīghrataraṃ rājaṃs tadā rājabalaṃ mahat
yasminn āvasathe śete sa muniḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
ājagāma tato 'paśyaṃs tam ṛṣiṃ taskarānugāḥ
tam apṛcchaṃs tato rājaṃs tathāvṛttaṃ tapodhanam
katareṇa pathā yātā dasyavo dvijasattama
tena gacchāmahe brahman pathā śīghrataraṃ vayam
tathā tu rakṣiṇāṃ teṣāṃ bruvatāṃ sa tapodhanaḥ
na kiṃ cid vacanaṃ rājann avadat sādhv asādhu vā
tatas te rājapuruṣā vicinvānās tadāśramam
dadṛśus tatra saṃlīnāṃs tāṃś corān dravyam eva ca
tataḥ śaṅkā samabhavad rakṣiṇāṃ taṃ muniṃ prati
saṃyamyainaṃ tato rājñe dasyūṃś caiva nyavedayan
taṃ rājā saha taiś corair anvaśād vadhyatām iti
sa vadhyaghātair ajñātaḥ śūle proto mahātapāḥ
tatas te śūlam āropya taṃ muniṃ rakṣiṇas tadā
pratijagmur mahīpālaṃ dhanāny ādāya tāny atha
śūlasthaḥ sa tu dharmātmā kālena mahatā tataḥ
nirāhāro 'pi viprarṣir maraṇaṃ nābhyupāgamat
dhārayām āsa ca prāṇān ṛṣīṃś ca samupānayat
śūlāgre tapyamānena tapas tena mahātmanā
saṃtāpaṃ paramaṃ jagmur munayo 'tha paraṃtapa
duḥkhitā ṛṣayas tatra āśramasthāś ca taṃ tadā
te rātrau śakunā bhūtvā saṃnyavartanta sarvataḥ
darśayanto yathāśakti tam apṛcchan dvijottamam
bhagavan kena doṣeṇa gantāsi dvijasattama
śrotum icchāmahe brahman kiṃ pāpaṃ kṛtavān asi
yeneha samanuprāptaṃ śūle duḥkhabhayaṃ mahat
tat te dvijavaraśreṣṭha saṃśayaḥ sumahān iha
īdṛśasya dvijaśreṣṭha ugre tapasi vartataḥ
tataḥ sa muniśārdūlas tān uvāca tapodhanān
doṣataḥ kaṃ gamiṣyāmi na hi me 'nyo 'parādhyati
taṃ dṛṣṭvā rakṣiṇas tatra tathā bahutithe 'hani
nyavedayaṃs tathā rājñe yathā vṛttaṃ narādhipa
śrutvā ca vacanaṃ teṣāṃ śūlastham ṛṣisattamam
rājā ca tam ṛṣiṃ śrutvā niṣkramya saha mantribhiḥ
prasādayām āsa tadā śūlastham ṛṣisattamam
yan mayāpakṛtaṃ mohād ajñānād ṛṣisattama
prasādaye tvāṃ tatrāhaṃ na me tvaṃ kroddhum arhasi
evam uktas tato rājñā prasādam akaron muniḥ
kṛtaprasādo rājā taṃ tataḥ samavatārayat
avatārya ca śūlāgrāt tac chūlaṃ niścakarṣa ha
aśaknuvaṃś ca niṣkraṣṭuṃ śūlaṃ mūle sa cicchide
sa tathāntargatenaiva śūlena vyacaran muniḥ
kaṇṭhapārśvāntarasthena śaṅkunā munir ācarat
puṣpabhājanadhārī syād iti cintāparo 'bhavat
sa tena tapasā lokān vijigye durlabhān paraiḥ
aṇīmāṇḍavya iti ca tato lokeṣu kathyate
sa gatvā sadanaṃ vipro dharmasya paramārthavit
āsanasthaṃ tato dharmaṃ dṛṣṭvopālabhata prabhuḥ
kiṃ nu tad duṣkṛtaṃ karma mayā kṛtam ajānatā
yasyeyaṃ phalanirvṛttir īdṛśy āsāditā mayā
śīghram ācakṣva me tattvaṃ paśya me tapaso balam
dharma uvāca
pataṃgakānāṃ puccheṣu tvayeṣīkā praveśitā
karmaṇas tasya te prāptaṃ phalam etat tapodhana
svalpam eva yathā dattaṃ dānaṃ bahuguṇaṃ bhavet
adharma evaṃ viprarṣe bahuduḥkhaphalapradaḥ
āṇimāṇḍavyaḥ
kasmin kāle mayā tat tu kṛtaṃ brūhi yathātatham
tenokto dharmarājo 'tha bālabhāve tvayā kṛtam
aṇīmāṇḍavya uvāca
alpe 'parādhe vipulo mama daṇḍas tvayā kṛtaḥ
śūdrayonāv ato dharma mānuṣaḥ saṃbhaviṣyasi
bālo hi dvādaśād varṣāj janmano yat kariṣyati
na bhaviṣyaty adharmo 'tra na prajñāsyati vai diśaḥ
maryādāṃ sthāpayāmy adya loke dharmaphalodayām
ā caturdaśamād varṣān na bhaviṣyati pātakam
pareṇa kurvatām evaṃ doṣa eva bhaviṣyati
vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
etena tv aparādhena śāpāt tasya mahātmanaḥ
dharmo vidurarūpeṇa śūdrayonāv ajāyata
dharme cārthe ca kuśalo lobhakrodhavivarjitaḥ
dīrghadarśī śamaparaḥ kurūṇāṃ ca hite rataḥ
vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
sarvato balavān dharmas tato 'pi brāhmaṇo mahān
itīha kathayām āsa bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ
vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
dhṛtarāṣṭre ca pāṇḍau ca vidure ca mahātmani
teṣu triṣu kumāreṣu jāteṣu kurujāṅgalam
kuravo 'tha kurukṣetraṃ trayam etad avardhata
ūrdhvasasyābhavad bhūmiḥ sasyāni phalavanti ca
yathartuvarṣī parjanyo bahupuṣpaphalā drumāḥ
vāhanāni prahṛṣṭāni muditā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
gandhavanti ca mālyāni rasavanti phalāni ca
vaṇigbhiś cāvakīryanta nagarāṇy atha śilpibhiḥ
śūrāś ca kṛtavidyāś ca santaś ca sukhino 'bhavan
nābhavan dasyavaḥ ke cin nādharmarucayo janāḥ
pradeśeṣv api rāṣṭrāṇāṃ kṛtaṃ yugam avartata
dānakriyādharmaśīlā yajñavrataparāyaṇāḥ
anyonyaprītisaṃyuktā vyavardhanta prajās tadā
mānakrodhavihīnāś ca janā lobhavivarjitāḥ
anyonyam abhyavardhanta dharmottaram avartata
tan mahodadhivat pūrṇaṃ nagaraṃ vai vyarocata
dvāratoraṇaniryūhair yuktam abhracayopamaiḥ
prāsādaśatasaṃbādhaṃ mahendrapurasaṃnibham
nadīṣu vanakhaṇḍeṣu vāpīpalvalasānuṣu
kānaneṣu ca ramyeṣu vijahrur muditā janāḥ
uttaraiḥ kurubhiḥ sārdhaṃ dakṣiṇāḥ kuravas tadā
vispardhamānā vyacaraṃs tathā siddharṣicāraṇaiḥ
nābhavat kṛpaṇaḥ kaś cin nābhavan vidhavāḥ striyaḥ
tasmiñ janapade ramye bahavaḥ kurubhiḥ kṛtāḥ
kūpārāmasabhāvāpyo brāhmaṇāvasathās tathā
babhūvuḥ sarvarddhiyutās tasmin rāṣṭre sadotsavāḥ
svāhākāraiḥ svadhābhiś ca saṃnivāsaḥ kurūṣitaḥ
bhīṣmeṇa śāstrato rājan sarvataḥ parirakṣite
babhūva ramaṇīyaś ca caityayūpaśatāṅkitaḥ
sa deśaḥ pararāṣṭrāṇi pratigṛhyābhivardhitaḥ
bhīṣmeṇa vihitaṃ rāṣṭre dharmacakram avartata
kriyamāṇeṣu kṛtyeṣu kumārāṇāṃ mahātmanām
paurajānapadāḥ sarve babhūvuḥ satatotsavāḥ
gṛheṣu kurumukhyānāṃ paurāṇāṃ ca narādhipa
dīyatāṃ bhujyatāṃ ceti vāco 'śrūyanta sarvaśaḥ
dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca pāṇḍuś ca viduraś ca mahāmatiḥ
janmaprabhṛti bhīṣmeṇa putravat paripālitāḥ
vaidikādhyayane yukto nītiśāstreṣu pāragaḥ
bhīṣmeṇa rājā kauravyo dhṛtarāṣṭro 'bhiṣecitaḥ
dhanurvede 'śvapṛṣṭhe ca gadāyuddhe 'sicarmaṇi
tathaiva gajaśikṣāyām astreṣu vividheṣu ca
arthadharmapradhānāsu vidyāsu vividhāsu ca
gataḥ pāraṃ yadā pāṇḍus tadā senāpatiḥ kṛtaḥ
dhṛtarāṣṭras tv acakṣuṣṭvād rājyaṃ na pratyapadyata
avaratvāc ca viduraḥ pāṇḍuś cāsīn mahīpatiḥ
amātyo manujendrasya bāla eva yaśasvinaḥ
praṇetā sarvadharmāṇāṃ bhīṣmeṇa viduraḥ kṛtaḥ
sarvaśāstrārthatattvajño buddhimedhāpaṭur yuvā
bhāvenāgamayuktena sarvaṃ vedayate jagat
pranaṣṭaḥ śaṃtanor vaṃśaḥ bhīṣmeṇa punar uddhṛtaḥ
tato nirvacanaṃ satsu tad idaṃ paripaṭhyate
kausalyā vīrasūḥ strīṇāṃ deśānāṃ kurujāṅgalam
bhīṣmo dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ purāṇāṃ gajasāhvayam
te trayaḥ kālayogena kumārā janamejaya
avardhanta mahātmāno nandayantaḥ suhṛjjanam
saṃskāraiḥ saṃskṛtās te tu vratādhyayanasaṃyutāḥ
śramavyāyāmakuśalāḥ samapadyanta yauvanam
dhanurvede 'śvapṛṣṭhe ca gadāyuddhe 'sicarmaṇi
tathaiva gajaśikṣāyāṃ nītiśāstre ca pāragāḥ
itihāsapurāṇeṣu nānāśikṣāsu cābhibho
vedavedāṅgatattvajñāḥ sarvatra kṛtaniśramāḥ
pāṇḍur dhanuṣi vikrānto narebhyo 'bhyadhiko 'bhavat
aty anyān balavān āsīd dhṛtarāṣṭro mahīpatiḥ
triṣu lokeṣu na tv āsīt kaś cid vidurasaṃmitaḥ
dharmanityas tato rājan dharme ca paramaṃ gataḥ
atha śuśrāva viprebhyo yādavasya mahīpateḥ
rūpayauvanasaṃpannāṃ sutāṃ sāgaragāsutaḥ
subalasya ca kalyāṇīṃ gāndhārādhipateḥ sutām
sutāṃ ca madrarājasya rūpeṇāpratimāṃ bhuvi
pranaṣṭaṃ śaṃtanor vaṃśaṃ samīkṣya punar uddhṛtam
tato nirvacanaṃ loke sarvarāṣṭreṣv avartata
vīrasūnāṃ kāśisute deśānāṃ kurujāṅgalam
sarvadharmavidāṃ bhīṣmaḥ purāṇāṃ gajasāhvayam
dhṛtarāṣṭras tv acakṣuṣṭvād rājyaṃ na pratyapadyata
karaṇatvāc ca viduraḥ pāṇḍur āsīn mahīpatiḥ
kadā cid atha gāṅgeyaḥ sarvanītiviśāradaḥ
viduraṃ dharmatattvajñaṃ vākyam āha yathocitam
tataḥ kāle bahutithe bhīṣmo viduram abravīt
bhīṣma uvāca
guṇaiḥ samuditaṃ samyag idaṃ naḥ prathitaṃ kulam
aty anyān pṛthivīpālān pṛthivyām adhirājyabhāk
rakṣitaṃ rājabhiḥ pūrvair dharmavidbhir mahātmabhiḥ
notsādam agamac cedaṃ kadā cid iha naḥ kulam
mayā ca satyavatyā ca kṛṣṇena ca mahātmanā
samavasthāpitaṃ bhūyo yuṣmāsu kulatantuṣu
vardhate tad idaṃ putra kulaṃ sāgaravad yathā
tathā mayā vidhātavyaṃ tvayā caiva viśeṣataḥ
śrūyate yādavī kanyā anurūpā kulasya naḥ
subalasyātmajā caiva tathā madreśvarasya ca
kulīnā rūpavatyaś ca nāthavatyaś ca sarvaśaḥ
ucitāś caiva saṃbandhe te 'smākaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
manye varayitavyās tā ity ahaṃ dhīmatāṃ vara
saṃtānārthaṃ kulasyāsya yad vā vidura manyase
vidura uvāca
bhavān pitā bhavān mātā bhavān naḥ paramo guruḥ
tasmāt svayaṃ kulasyāsya vicārya kuru yad dhitam
vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
atha śuśrāva viprebhyo gāndhārīṃ subalātmajām
ārādhya varadaṃ devaṃ bhaganetraharaṃ haram
gāndhārī kila putrāṇāṃ śataṃ lebhe varaṃ śubhā
iti śrutvā ca tattvena bhīṣmaḥ kurupitāmahaḥ
tato gāndhārarājasya preṣayām āsa bhārata
acakṣur iti tatrāsīt subalasya vicāraṇā
kulaṃ khyātiṃ ca vṛttaṃ ca buddhyā tu prasamīkṣya saḥ
dadau tāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrāya gāndhārīṃ dharmacāriṇīm
gāndhārī tv api śuśrāva dhṛtarāṣṭram acakṣuṣam
ātmānaṃ ditsitaṃ cāsmai pitrā mātrā ca bhārata
tataḥ sā paṭṭam ādāya kṛtvā bahuguṇaṃ śubhā
babandha netre sve rājan pativrataparāyaṇā
nātyaśnīyāṃ patim aham ity evaṃ kṛtaniścayā
tato gāndhārarājasya putraḥ śakunir abhyayāt
svasāraṃ parayā lakṣmyā yuktām ādāya kauravān
tāṃ tadā dhṛtarāṣṭrāya dadau paramasatkṛtām
bhīṣmasyānumate caiva vivāhaṃ samakārayat
tato vivāhaṃ cakre 'syā nakṣatre sarvasaṃmate
saubalas tu mahārājā śakuniḥ priyadarśanaḥ
dattvā sa bhaginīṃ vīro yathārhaṃ ca paricchadam
punar āyāt svanagaraṃ bhīṣmeṇa pratipūjitaḥ
gāndhāry api varārohā śīlācāraviceṣṭitaiḥ
tuṣṭiṃ kurūṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ janayām āsa bhārata
gāndhārī sā patiṃ dṛṣṭvā prajñācakṣuṣam īśvaram
aticārād bhṛśaṃ bhītā bhartuḥ sā samacintayat
sā dṛṣṭivinivṛttāpi bhartuś ca samatāṃ yayau
na hi sūkṣme 'py atīcāre bhartuḥ sā vavṛte tadā
vṛttenārādhya tān sarvān pativrataparāyaṇā
vācāpi puruṣān anyān suvratā nānvakīrtayat
tasyāḥ sahodarāḥ kanyāḥ punar eva dadau daśa
gāndhārarājaḥ subalo bhīṣmeṇa varitas tadā
satyavratāṃ satyasenāṃ sudeṣṇāṃ ca susaṃhitām
tejaḥśravāṃ suśravāṃ ca tathaiva nikṛtiṃ śubhām
śaṃbhuvāṃ ca daśārṇāṃ ca gāndhārīr daśa viśrutāḥ
ekāhnā pratijagrāha dhṛtarāṣṭro janeśvaraḥ
tataḥ śāṃtanavo bhīṣmo dhanuṣkrītās tatas tataḥ
adadād dhṛtarāṣṭrāya rājaputrīḥ paraḥ śatam
vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
śūro nāma yaduśreṣṭho vasudevapitābhavat
tasya kanyā pṛthā nāma rūpeṇāsadṛśī bhuvi
paitṛṣvaseyāya sa tām anapatyāya vīryavān
agryam agre pratijñāya svasyāpatyasya vīryavān
agrajāteti tāṃ kanyām agryānugrahakāṅkṣiṇe
pradadau kuntibhojāya sakhā sakhye mahātmane
sā niyuktā pitur gehe devatātithipūjane
ugraṃ paryacarad ghoraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ saṃśitavratam
nigūḍhaniścayaṃ dharme yaṃ taṃ durvāsasaṃ viduḥ
tam ugraṃ saṃśitātmānaṃ sarvayatnair atoṣayat
dadhyājyakādibhir nityaṃ vyañjanaiḥ pratyahaṃ śubhā
sahasrasaṃkhyair yogīndraṃ samupācarad uttamā
durvāsā vatsarasyānte dadau mantram anuttamam
tasyai sa pradadau mantram āpaddharmānvavekṣayā
abhicārābhisaṃyuktam abravīc caiva tāṃ muniḥ
abhicārāyutaṃ tasyā ācaṣṭa bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
yaṃ yaṃ devaṃ tvam etena mantreṇāvāhayiṣyasi
tasya tasya prasādena putras tava bhaviṣyati
tathoktā sā tu vipreṇa tena kautūhalāt tadā
raves tasya parīkṣārthaṃ kuntī kanyāpi bhāskaram
kanyā satī devam arkam ājuhāva yaśasvinī
tato ghanāntaraṃ kṛtvā svamārgaṃ tapanas tadā
upatasthe sa tāṃ kanyāṃ pṛthāṃ pṛthulalocanām
avatīrya svamārgāc ca divyamūrtidharaḥ svayam
sā dadarśa tam āyāntaṃ bhāskaraṃ lokabhāvanam
vismitā cānavadyāṅgī dṛṣṭvā tan mahad adbhutam
kunty uvāca
sūrya uvāca
vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
tāṃ samāsādya devas tu vivasvān idam abravīt
ayam asmy asitāpāṅge brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
kaś cin me brahmavit prādād varaṃ vidyāṃ ca śatruhan
yad vijijñāsayāhvānaṃ kṛtavaty asmi te vibho
tad asminn aparādhe tvāṃ śirasābhiprasādaye
yoṣito hi sadā rakṣyāḥ svaparāddhāpi nityadā
vedāhaṃ sarvam evaitad yad durvāsā dadau tava
saṃtyajyobhe mānabhaye kriyatāṃ saṃgamo mayā
amoghaṃ darśanaṃ mahyam āhūtaś cāsmi te śubhe
vṛthāhvānād dhi te bhīru doṣo hi syād asaṃśayam
saivam uktā bahuvidhaṃ sāntvaṃ krūraṃ vivasvatā
sā tu naicchad varārohā kanyāham iti pārthiva
bandhupakṣabhayād bhītā lajjayā ca tapasvinī
tām arkaḥ punar evedam abravīd bharatarṣabha
matprasādān na te rājñi bhavitā doṣa ity uta
evam uktvā tu bhagavān kuntibhojasutāṃ tadā
